sentences.en: As she spoke, she watched the muscles in his forearm flex when he shifted gears.
sentences.cn: 她一边说一边注视着他换挡时前臂弯曲的样子.

sentences.en: Assessment of Forearm Pronation Strength in C 6 and C 7 Radiculopathies.
sentences.cn: C7神经根型颈椎病中旋前圆肌肌力的评估.

sentences.en: Forearm and wrist movement is usually the biggest cause of inconsistency.
sentences.cn: 前臂和手腕运动通常是最大的不一致性的原因.

sentences.en: He had a tattoo on his forearm.
How did you come by that scar on your forearm?
sentences.cn: 你臂上的伤疤是怎样来的?

sentences.en: I get more power from a forearm, overhead shot.
sentences.cn: 从臂上及头顶的打击,我能得到较多的力量击球.

sentences.en: I struck it away and got a bite on my forearm.
sentences.cn: 我把它打跑了，但小臂被咬了一口。

sentences.en: It is ideal for building your hand and forearm strength.
sentences.cn: 能有效加强使用者手部和小臂的力量.

sentences.en: Jump up, elbow flexion ( forearm back ), also back up the wrist.
sentences.cn: 跳起时, 屈肘 ( 前臂向后 ), 手腕也向后翻.

sentences.en: My forearm pass goes too high.
sentences.cn: 我前臂传球传得太高了.

sentences.en: Objective : To study normal and injured forearm interosseous membrane manifestions ( IOM ) on MRI.
sentences.cn: 目的: 研究正常和损伤的前臂骨间膜的MRI表现.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo observe the effect of comprehensive therapy on forearm extensor myotenositis.
sentences.cn: 目的观察综合疗法治疗前臂伸肌腱周围炎的康复效果.

sentences.en: The forearm scrapes the skin on his face. He is ready to cry.
sentences.cn: 对方的前臂擦着了他的脸皮, 他简直要哭出来了.

sentences.en: These adjustments with the wrist and forearm are difficult to do consistently.
sentences.cn: 这些用手腕和前臂调整难以一致地如此作.

trans.tran_en: the lower part of the arm, between the hand and the elbow
to prepare or arm (someone, esp oneself) in advance
